Articles.Content: While doing some experiments I discovered that a Kerbal can now fall from at least 10km high and survive! Do they have a higher impact tolerance now or is this a matter of their drag in the new atmo?

If you activate their jetpack, they will bounce. Even from orbit, if they don't burn, they will bounce. (unless you come in at a ridiculous speed and they go through the terrain before it registers the impact, then they will poof from the 1/40 second calculations.)

I'll have to check, but I think they were bouncing without me using the jetpack, and certainly it was stowed on impact...

EVA->plummet->BOING!!!->ragdoll for a few seconds.
They used to be able to fall from the Mun and bounce... It's how I got Jeb home from a Mun landing a few versions back.

Is it me or does that seem kinda lame?

Now we need a RealDeathWhenFalling mod.
